Name: Sinister Halloween
About the game: Experience a Halloween night in Mountain peaks, Northern Canada. Famous for its Horror Festival. You go out with your friends, trick or treating, entering haunted themed houses as you make your way to the big party, but this year's holiday of the afterlife brings something sinister. Are the legends true? FEATURES Single Player story-driven campaign. 9 Maps. Experience the horror and story behind this sinister night Survival Maps. 8 New Maps. Load up and run to the end and kill them all. Survive the Onslaught! Traditional FPS Experience [Mouse and Keyboard]. Interactive VR Horror Experience. VR driven game-play mechanics: Perform physical actions true to life that immerse players deep inside the world. VR LOCOMOTION Walking Locomotion, Teleportation ENEMIES / MONSTERS Werewolves, Mama Ghost Lady, Graveyard Mummies, Spirit Ghosts, Chainsaw Butcher, Forest Trees, Soul Reaper WEAPONS AND TOOLS Pistol, Shotgun, Fire Torch, Holy Cross, Notes, NewsPapers, Spirit Books We got it all for Halloween, the Horror, the Adventure, the Atmosphere, Sexy Trick or Treater Friends, Candy, and above all the legendary Monsters. Great game for Halloween Parties. Happy Halloween.
